title: Shadow Isles poro ward issues.
body: I bought the SI poro ward to match the icon, but I noticed that when I upgrade my trinket to a pink {{item:3362}}, it places a dragon slayer poro ward (Which isn't even out yet) . I first noticed this two days ago in a ranked match. Is anyone else having this issue or am I insane? I'll try to get a screenshot of it tonight.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!
